attributes.action: To call for a general election immediately
attributes.additional_details:
Individual mp's failure to act on behalf of their constituents by their refusal to complete Brexit by voting against any bills that would take us out of the EU.
Mp's changing parties to further their own interests rather than resign and hold a bi-election.
Calls by MP's to hold another referendum because they disagree with the result of the first referendum.
attributes.background: The failure of both houses of Parliament to ensure a clean Brexit.
